message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a price of $9,500. I think this product would be very valuable to you, and this is a very competitive price.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $8,500?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $9,500 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm still aiming to keep my expenses within $8,500 if possible. Could we possibly agree on $8,750?
